articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Memorable Andrew Symonds moments: From explosive batting to 'monkeygate'
articles.description: Andrew Symonds, who has died aged 46, was widely considered one of the most skilled all-rounders Australian cricket has seen, routinely thumping runs and taking wickets.
articles.content:

articles.author: Sarah Swain
articles.title: Local man tried to save cricket star Andrew Symonds after car crash on remote road
articles.description: A man has described how he tried to save cricketer Andrew Symonds after he crashed his four wheel drive in a remote part of north Queensland.
articles.content: A man has described how he tried to save cricketer Andrew Symonds after he crashed his four wheel drive in a remote part of north Queensland.

articles.title: Shane Warne memorial - watch & follow updates

articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
